name: Vanishing Space
description:
Vanishing Space is a Spaceshooter. You are surrounded by an endless void crawling towards you. As your goal is to achieve as many points as possible, youre primary objective is to avoid the void by flying around performing awesome moves and collecting energy by destroying every obstacle in your way.

Controles:
 tilt spaceship:   [A/D]
 speed up      :     [W]
 fire at will  : [space]
 use boost     : [shift]

Everything in the game was made by us, Minewar, Doctor and Zetraeder, in 72 hours, using Gamemaker Studio 1.4, Paint.net, sfxr and Ableton Live 9.
